metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17554 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
A NULL pointer dereference (DoS) Vulnerability was found in the functionaubio_source_avcodec_readframe in io/source_avcodec.c of aubio 0.4.6, whichmay lead to DoS when playing a crafted audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17554` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aubio-tools - 0.4.6-2
libaubio5 - 0.4.6-2
python-aubio - 0.4.6-2
python3-aubio - 0.4.6-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: aubio package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.6-2').
